categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the New Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: This Jedi was a member of Luke Skywalker's New Jedi Order one year after the Jedi Academy on Yavin 4 was founded.

In 12 ABY, this Jedi, along with his fellow Jedi trainees, was taught in the ways of the Force by a Jedi trainer. He later helped Kyle Katarn and a Jedi trainer fend of against Desann's dark side minions. As a full-fledged Jedi Knight, this Jedi survived the battle on Yavin IV.
This Jedi joined Luke's rank as a Jedi Master in the New Jedi Order by 14 ABY, and participated in the Jedi-lead strike on Korriban that ended the threat posed by the Disciples of Ragnos.
This Jedi wielded a yellow-bladed lightsaber with a Retaliator-style hilt.

The Jedi was introduced as a skin used by multiple NPCs in Star Wars: Jedi Knight II: Jedi Outcast, but he was later treated as an individual character toward the end of the game and also throughout Jedi Academy.
In Jedi Outcast the Jedi was voiced by Dominic Armato, Jedi Academy, by Dee Bradley Baker.
In Jedi Outcast, the lightsaber style that this Jedi used would indicate that he was a Jedi Knight towards the end of the game.
